episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' features facts about the dangerous early roller coasters, a national grocery bag packing competition in America, the introduction of shampoo to the UK by Shakedeen Muhammad, and the incredible metabolism of hummingbirds.

facts.fact: The first loop-the-loop roller coaster closed because so many riders were passing out.
America has a national grocery bag packing competition.
One of the things you need to know in order to become a British citizen is who introduced shampoo to the UK.
If your metabolism was as fast as a hummingbird's, you'd need to drink a can of coke every minute to stay alive.
